## FieldNavigationPolicy.isApplicable() method

Returns whether the given object can be navigated from by this policy.

**Signature:**

```typescript
isApplicable(current: any): current is Field;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  current | any | The object to check if this policy applies to. |

**Returns:**

current is [Field](./blockly.field.md)

True if the object is a Field.
